title: Drawing, "Yoke of Oxen", 1879
markings: Watermark: "Damask Linene" and hand holding a rose
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite ?, at lower right:  W. H. '79
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a yoke of oxen with a drover, drawing a truck on which a woman sits with a small child on her lap, and a faint indication of trees visible in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Yoke of Oxen", 1879.
1879. Graphite on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-261.
